projectsCS.title: Image Processor
projectsCS.description: An image processing program that allows users to load in images and manipulate them in ways such as, blur, sharpen, flip, and many more, then save the image.

projectsCS.title: Connect Four
projectsCS.description: An interactive game of Connect Four against a bot that aims to find the best and most intelligent move.

projectsCS.title: Password Generator
projectsCS.description: A random password generation programs that generates a sequence of characters based on supplied parameters such as number of words, numbers, symbol, etc.

projectsCS.title: Image Classification
projectsCS.description: A program using convolutional neural networks with the goal of differentiating unique hand symbols of rock, paper, or scissors
